Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We analyzed genotype / phenotype correlations , on the basis of the constitution of a WT1 mutation database of 84 germ - line mutations , to compare the distribution and type of mutations , according to the different symptoms .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| WT1 related diseases (or disorders) |

The paragraph does not mention any specific disease names. It only mentions WT1 mutations and their correlation with different symptoms. Therefore, the most precise entity that can be identified from the paragraph is "WT1 related diseases (or disorders)".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| WT1 related diseases (or disorders) |

The paragraph only mentions "WT1 mutations" in relation to "different symptoms", indicating that these mutations are associated with certain diseases or disorders. Therefore, the most precise entity that can be identified from the paragraph is "WT1 related diseases (or disorders)". Other terms such as "germ-line mutations" and "constitution of a WT1 mutation database" do not clearly refer to diseases and are therefore not included in the table.
